name: Extreme Sports Car: Highway Ra
description:
Extreme Sports Car: Highway Raing is the best car driving simulator you are a fast car driver and roads and city streets are open for you. you will find never ending things in this free drift driving simulator.this is not the army extreme car driving 3d game so you caught the prisoners playing police car games.this is drift lamborghini car games you run your cars with smashing speed at asphalt road to show your illegal stunt actions with drifting.
Features of furious driving:

- HD graphics
- 3D camera views
- Endless driver car
- Plenty car for racers
- Carefully racing techniques
- Multiple overtake challenges
